segment.source: Manage iOS apps you purchased through a volume-purchase program with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Manage iOS apps you purchased through a volume-purchase program with Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Manage iOS apps you purchased through a volume-purchase program with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Manage iOS apps you purchased through a volume-purchase program with Microsoft Intune

segment.source: Some app stores give you the ability to purchase multiple licenses for an app you want to run in your company.
segment.target: Some app stores give you the ability to purchase multiple licenses for an app you want to run in your company.

segment.source: This helps you reduce the administrative overhead of tracking multiple purchased copies of apps.
segment.target: This helps you reduce the administrative overhead of tracking multiple purchased copies of apps.

segment.source: helps you manage apps you purchased through such a program by importing the license information from the app store, tracking how many of the licenses you have used, and preventing you from installing more copies of the app than you own.
segment.target: helps you manage apps you purchased through such a program by importing the license information from the app store, tracking how many of the licenses you have used, and preventing you from installing more copies of the app than you own.

segment.source: Manage volume-purchased apps for iOS devices
segment.target: Manage volume-purchased apps for iOS devices

segment.source: You purchase multiple licenses for iOS apps through the Apple Volume Purchase Program for Business (VPP).
segment.target: You purchase multiple licenses for iOS apps through the Apple Volume Purchase Program for Business (VPP).

segment.source: This involves setting up an Apple VPP account from the Apple web site and the Apple VPP token into .
segment.target: This involves setting up an Apple VPP account from the Apple web site and the Apple VPP token into .

segment.source: You can then synchronize your volume purchase information with and track your volume-purchased app use.
segment.target: You can then synchronize your volume purchase information with and track your volume-purchased app use.

segment.source: Before you start
segment.target: Before you start

segment.source: Before you begin, you'll need to get a VPP token from Apple, and upload this to your account.
segment.target: Before you begin, you'll need to get a VPP token from Apple, and upload this to your account.

segment.source: Additionally, you should understand the following:
segment.target: Additionally, you should understand the following:

segment.source: Each organization can have only one VPP account and token.
segment.target: Each organization can have only one VPP account and token.

segment.source: Once you associate an Apple VPP account to Intune, you cannot subsequently associate a different account.
segment.target: Once you associate an Apple VPP account to Intune, you cannot subsequently associate a different account.

segment.source: For this reason, it's very important that more than one person has the details of the account you use.
segment.target: For this reason, it's very important that more than one person has the details of the account you use.

segment.source: If you have previously used a VPP token with a different product, you must generate a new one to use with .
segment.target: If you have previously used a VPP token with a different product, you must generate a new one to use with .

segment.source: Each token is valid for one year.
segment.target: Each token is valid for one year.

segment.source: By default, syncs with the Apple VPP service twice a day.
segment.target: By default, syncs with the Apple VPP service twice a day.

segment.source: You can, however, initiate a manual sync at any time.
segment.target: You can, however, initiate a manual sync at any time.

segment.source: After you have imported the VPP token in Intune do not import the same token into any other device management solution.
segment.target: After you have imported the VPP token in Intune do not import the same token into any other device management solution.

segment.source: Doing so might result in the loss of license assignment and user records.
segment.target: Doing so might result in the loss of license assignment and user records.

segment.source: Before you start to use iOS VPP with Intune, remove any existing VPP user accounts created with other MDM vendors.
segment.target: Before you start to use iOS VPP with Intune, remove any existing VPP user accounts created with other MDM vendors.

segment.source: Intune will not synchronize those user accounts into Intune as a security measure.
segment.target: Intune will not synchronize those user accounts into Intune as a security measure.

segment.source: Intune will only synchromize data from the Apple VPP service that was created by Intune.
segment.target: Intune will only synchromize data from the Apple VPP service that was created by Intune.

segment.source: To get and upload an Apple VPP token
segment.target: To get and upload an Apple VPP token

segment.source: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Admin > iOS and Mac OS X > Volume Purchase Program.
segment.target: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Admin > iOS and Mac OS X > Volume Purchase Program.

segment.source: Click the Apple VPP Account link, and if you haven't already, sign up for the Volume Purchase Program for Business.
segment.target: Click the Apple VPP Account link, and if you haven't already, sign up for the Volume Purchase Program for Business.

segment.source: Once you are signed up, download the Apple VPP token for your account.
segment.target: Once you are signed up, download the Apple VPP token for your account.

segment.source: On the Manage Apple Volume Purchase Program (VPP) page of the console, click Upload the VPP token.
segment.target: On the Manage Apple Volume Purchase Program (VPP) page of the console, click Upload the VPP token.

segment.source: In the Upload the VPP token dialog box, enter or paste the VPP token name, and your Apple ID, then click Upload.
segment.target: In the Upload the VPP token dialog box, enter or paste the VPP token name, and your Apple ID, then click Upload.

segment.source: In the warning dialog box, click the checkbox to indicate that you understand that you can't change to a different VPP account later, then click Yes.
segment.target: In the warning dialog box, click the checkbox to indicate that you understand that you can't change to a different VPP account later, then click Yes.

segment.source: On the Volume Purchase Program page, you can now view information about the Apple VPP token including when it was last updated, when it will expire, and when it was last synchronized with .
segment.target: On the Volume Purchase Program page, you can now view information about the Apple VPP token including when it was last updated, when it will expire, and when it was last synchronized with .

segment.source: You can synchronize the data held by Apple with at any time by clicking Sync now.
segment.target: You can synchronize the data held by Apple with at any time by clicking Sync now.

segment.source: Step 2 - Upload and deploy a volume-purchased app
segment.target: Step 2 - Upload and deploy a volume-purchased app

segment.source: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Apps > Managed Software > Volume-Purchased apps.
segment.target: In the Microsoft Intune administration console, click Apps > Managed Software > Volume-Purchased apps.

segment.source: Use the instructions in the Deploy apps to mobile devices in Microsoft Intune topic to complete uploading, creation, and deployment of the app.
segment.target: Use the instructions in the Deploy apps to mobile devices in Microsoft Intune topic to complete uploading, creation, and deployment of the app.

segment.source: When you deploy the app as a Required install, a license is used by each user that installs the app.
segment.target: When you deploy the app as a Required install, a license is used by each user that installs the app.

segment.source: To reclaim a license, you must change the deployment action to Uninstall.
segment.target: To reclaim a license, you must change the deployment action to Uninstall.

segment.source: The license will be reclaimed once the app uninstalls.
segment.target: The license will be reclaimed once the app uninstalls.

segment.source: When a user with an eligible device first tries to install a VPP app, they will be asked to join the Apple Volume Purchase program.
segment.target: When a user with an eligible device first tries to install a VPP app, they will be asked to join the Apple Volume Purchase program.

segment.source: They must do this before the app installation proceeds.
segment.target: They must do this before the app installation proceeds.

segment.source: Look at the VPP Terms Status column to see the acceptance status for each user to whom the app was deployed.
segment.target: Look at the VPP Terms Status column to see the acceptance status for each user to whom the app was deployed.

segment.source: If there are no further licenses available, the deployment will fail.
segment.target: If there are no further licenses available, the deployment will fail.

segment.source: Step 3 - Monitor Apple VPP apps
segment.target: Step 3 - Monitor Apple VPP apps

segment.source: You can monitor which VPP apps have been deployed, and how many licenses are used from the Apps workspace, in the Managed Software > Volume-Purchased Apps node.
segment.target: You can monitor which VPP apps have been deployed, and how many licenses are used from the Apps workspace, in the Managed Software > Volume-Purchased Apps node.

segment.source: You can also use app Filters to examine the status of each app install.
segment.target: You can also use app Filters to examine the status of each app install.

segment.source: See Also
segment.target: See Also

segment.source: Deploy and configure apps with Microsoft Intune
segment.target: Deploy and configure apps with Microsoft Intune
